name: Witch Pine Forest - Walking sim
description:
This is a 3D environment project focused on level design with lighting and nature.

You can visit this strange place along many path and discover a lot of view place.

This is witch pine forest, with her hut and stuff. There is two other location : the old ruins and the sacrifice altar.
There also minor place like a merchant area, bone and ornement passage, a walk along pine tree etc.

Enjoy this discover tour !!!

Link to the project on artstation : https://www.artstation.com/artwork/QnWaY4
